techmeme.title: Automattic demanding an 8% cut of WP Engine's revenue is a wanton violation of general open source ideals, and the damage could extend far beyond WordPress (David Heinemeier Hansson/HEY)
ByteDance launches its first earbuds, the open-ear wearables called Ola Friend, designed as an audio assistant, shipping on October 17 in China for ~$170 (Coco Feng/South China Morning Post)
An interview with Shield AI co-founder Brandon Tseng on the startup's mission of building the world's best AI pilot, the ethics of military AI use, and more (Margaux MacColl/TechCrunch)
An investigation details a $243M crypto heist in August 2024 in which a social engineering attack targeted a single customer of Gemini's crypto exchange (Brian Krebs/Krebs on Security)
A profile of FTC Chair Lina Khan, whose term ended in September 2024, as a bipartisan club of tech figures and VCs, including Reid Hoffman, call for her ouster (Bloomberg)
